title: Lowrider Essentials - Authentic Future Beats, Neo Chill, Urban Soundscapes
description: Essential soundtracks for sprawling future city drives. 20 authentic tracks produced by pro composer
longDescription:
Video Preview: https://youtu.be/DOvWE7Ox5Ko

Stream Audio: https://s.disco.ac/psmljlmvwiau


Authentic Future Beats, Neo Chillout, Lofi Hip Hop, Electronica, Golden era Hip Hop, Funk and Soul,

Bass Music and more. This pack includes a wide array of genres suited to many types of games and apps.

The total of 20 original tracks are all seemlessly loopable, with a play time of almost 1 hour unlooped.


This pack is produced by Rob Blake, an award winning composer working in Trailers, Games, Film and TV.


MNUMNTL - Lowrider Essentials, is the introductory version of our first release 'Lowrider Anthems'

In this pack we offer the main tracks from that album with their corresponding soundbed.


Royalty free use for all interactive media (Games and Apps). Exclusions apply - see documentation


Use the album in full as an original soundtrack to your game, and as a simple adaptive audio solution with the included soundbeds for open worlds and dynamic variation within game play.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 16Bit WAV 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

55+ minutes of audio provided
